newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: U.S. tourist locked in stairwell, misses wedding.
newsitem.headline: U.S. tourist locked in stairwell, misses wedding.

text.p: A 86-year-old American tourist, who went missing after he failed to show up at the wedding he flew to Australia to attend, has been found alive after spending three days locked in the stairwell of his Sydney motel.
Hollis Lee, from San Diego, flew into Sydney on Friday for a Saturday wedding but when he did not turn up, relatives raised the alarm, a police spokesman said on Monday.

On Monday afternoon staff at Lee's motel in the northern beachside suburb of Manly found the elderly tourist, who had been accidentally locked in the stairwell, and he was taken to Manly Hospital suffering from dehydration.
